root.name: Avadon 2: The Corruption
root.description: SummaryAvadon 2: The Corruption is the second game in the Avadon trilogy, and the follow up to 2011's Avadon: The Black Fortress. The game comes from the veteran indie developer Jeff Vogel and his Spiderweb Software, and promises to be rich in choices and consequences. The game can be played and enjoyed without any previous experience with the series, according to the developer. Other things the game is promising areFive different character classes, with dozens of unique spells and abilities.Many different endingsDozens of side quests, dungeons, and secrets to discover.Huge adventure with lots of replay valueHomepageAvadon 2: The Corruption homepage
